amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to prohibit agents registered under the Foreign Agents Act from serving on an independent redistricting commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Trahan amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Trahan amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mrs. Trahan.
